name: Wizards' Clash
description: Wizards' Clash is fantasy turn-based card game. Gameplay is easier than classic card games, yet it has some particular features.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Pixel Shaders 2 DirectX: Version 9.0

reviews.review_text: Not good...not good at all.  The concept is interesting: you build and protect a tower while defeating the enemy's tower or hero, and use a variety of cards from your deck as spells or minions to do so.  The problem is, it's far too overly simplistic, which creates an incredibly boring experience.   No Deck Editing
